def turn(state):
    # New question.
    results = set()
    for config in getsets(idxs, 4):
        for x, y, z, w in permutations(config):
            check_x_large = is_large(x, ctx)
            check_x_light_grey = is_light(x, ctx) and is_grey(x, ctx)
            check_y_dark = is_dark(y, ctx)
            check_z_dark = is_dark(z, ctx)
            check_w_dark = is_dark(w, ctx)
            check_y_right_x = is_right(y, x, ctx)
            check_z_left_x = is_left(z, x, ctx)
            check_w_above_x = is_above(w, x, ctx) and is_right(w, x, ctx)
            if (
                check_x_large
                and check_x_light_grey
                and check_y_dark
                and check_z_dark
                and check_w_dark
                and check_y_right_x
                and check_z_left_x
                and check_w_above_x
            ):
                results.add(frozenset([x, y, z, w]))
    return results
state = turn(state)
